The shoes are nice looking, and seem to be well made, but wide they are not; and won’t accept a high instep. I have had these for a few months and wear them often, usually daily. The build quality seems good but I wonder if the materials will hold up. I'm happy I bought them and hope they last for a couple years at least.
I have been wearing shoes my whole life.  These wide toes are great.  Will definitely buy another pair.
Comfortable.  Easy to wear.

I'd have to say the quality of these shoes blows the others out of the water, and the price is amazing. These are both durable and comfortable. I'll be buying more in the future!

These shoes are comfortable as soon as you put them on, no "breaking them in" period. Really enjoy how easily they slide on and off. They look great in the lighter color I think I'm going to order the darker cooler for more variety.

I've been wearing these shoes for a couple months and they're holding up really well. They don't have much (or any?) cushion but I like the minimalist feel most of the time. When I wore them in NYC, walking big miles every day, I did find some added insoles to be nice.

These are some light and cheap nice summer shoes. Easy to slip on and off. Perfect width for my wide feet. Do keep in mind these are barefoot style shoes so there is no support for people that need arch support. Highly recommended.

Flat zero drop shoe that I use at the gym. Easy on and off with no tying laces.

Just some company's have a higher overhead with advetising.  These shoes are just like the others my family have wore. Great pair of shoes they are very comfortable. I like how light they are and how well they fit my feet they are fully true to size. I like that my toes dont feel cramped in them. These are great. They fit well. They are breathable.  I pretty much always get the same size. Zero drop shoes save me from ankle and back pain. I really like it it fit really well and is comfortable

They are super comfy. I have huge bunions and these don't rub and irritate it like crazy. It's only a 4 rating because nothing is perfect, there was only One who is. The biggest gripe I have of these is the padding in soles goes out pretty quick but nothing an insert can't solve.

I've owned a few Whitin flat shoes and stopped wearing them after awhile. These are better. The cork insoles make a difference to me, especially on the hard tile floors at work. The tongue has thicker padding which is also better. It distributes the laces over the top of my foot more comfortably than my Whitins. These were also 40% off which makes them a better value too. The dark blue are nice looking and hide the wide toe box which can look clownish at times.

It’s hard because I have a brand that I am used to. These are very comfortable, soft soled shoes. I like the fit even though they’re a bit wide. I would recommend them. I just don’t quite like them as much as my normal brand. For the price, though, you can’t go wrong.
These were supposed to be wide and a barefoot toebox.  These are more narrow than horrible dress shoes.  They are not what is advertised.

So I grew up barefoot or in Vans or Tom's, and I can't stand an arch in my shoes.  The wee bit that I get in flip flops is usually okay, but honestly, even some of those are too much.  So naturally, I'm inclined towards a barefoot shoe in the first place.  But these are just great!  The elastic laces make for quick on and off while keeping the shoe secure on my foot; they're not really runners, but you can jog back out to the car to grab something you forgot without it becoming a workout just to keep the shoes on.  The soles are holding up nicely, and I think I've probably put about 50-70 miles on them, just doing our usual dog walking and theme park trips!  I was a little worried about the material, but in person, it looks normal, so I htink it was just one of the pictures that was putting me off at first.

Why don't they use EVA lightweight soles like everyone else? This shoe is heavier than it should. It would be light, flexible, and supportive if they use foam rubber, and they could still maintain a zero drop. Yes, you can hire me

评论概述: Surprised how good these shoes are
评论详情: I've had every major brand of barefoot shoes and these are on par or better for casual slipon everyday wear.
True to size, very comfortable all around, looks great (not like clown shoes). Hoping these last a while. I had bought Whitin previously, and these are so much better and comfortable to walk on.

评论概述: Looks great, wide toe box a plus
评论详情: The size was fairly true to size. It’s attractive and well constructed. The only con is that the insole is very flat and not very comfortable. A walking shoe it definitely is not. But as a dressy casual shoe it delivers.

I wear an H-width shoe, and I don't quite think these were made for that type of foot. I wasn't a fan of the ultra-thick cork sole, and they just didn't have that super flexible feel that I look for in a barefoot shoe.  If you have narrow feet (D width and under) these would be a great shoe for you. They look cool, and colors are great. I can't say they're a good fit for people with truly wide feet.

I just got these and these are probably the best barefoot shoes I’ve ever owned and I’ve owned many types. I purchased a size 11 and my normal foot size is a 10.5 and I thought these would be too big but they’re not. They give you just enough room and still feel comfortable without walking weird. The style is great and exactly for a barefoot sneaker. The bottoms are the perfect thickness and slip resistant. The material feels very durable but I may still want to spray them to prevent staining. I really like the rubber on the laces to tighten them — this is so you can either slip them n and go or you can tie the laces tight. Another thing I love is that you can remove the padded/cork insole to go fully barefoot and flat. They really thought that and the attention to detail is there. I really recommend these sneakers to anyone looking for a high quality barefoot sneaker but a fraction of the price. I’m already looking to purchase another pair and it’s only been 24 hours. I will make a video and post it shortly.

评论概述: These were amazing for wide feet

评论概述: Looks sharp and feels great, good quality

I'm also able to wear toe spacers and the shoe still fits comfortably. Worth every penny. Buy yourself three pairs.

I thought this was a nice transitional shoe from what is considered “normal” toes box to an actual toe box. My son said his toes had room and they were comfortable but he couldn’t get past the wider toe box aesthetic-wise (teenager) otherwise he liked them 🤦🏻‍♀️

These are very comfortable for me. Barefoot is my favorite but not always appropriate nor comfortable and these shoes are as close it Barefoot as I have ever tried! They are not entirely slip resistant, and not terrific on coarse gravel (the soles are rather thin) but overall these are winners in my book.

These are very comfortable.  I have wide feet with a high instep so.often times shoes are uncomfortable for me. But these are great! The insoles are supportive and comfortable.  The shoes.are easy on and off without being loose. For the money I'd order these again once these wear out. Safe to say this is my new lazy shoe go too! As a bonus they are light weight and look pretty good with casual clothes!4 stars until I use them more and see how durable they are.  Tho the build quality appears good.

I love the look and feel of these Barefoot Box Shoes. They have a classic look with a unique twist. They are very comfortable, look great. Well-made and allow you to have multiple style options with the removable insoles. It's a great concept in shoes. The back part of the shoe is a little scratchy upon first wear, but it definitely gets better with each time you wear them. They're awesome after they're broken in. High quality, great looking, and an excellent choice. Highly recommended!

评论概述: Comfortable and great fitting barefoot shoes
评论详情: These are now one of my favorite barefoot shoes. The only negative is the ugly orange shoelace they put on these. I don't know why, but I just can't stand how those laces look with them popping out the sides of the shoe. Fortunately, they offer a second set of standard laces in the box, so after re-lacing the shoes these are now my favorite go to barefoot shoes in black.
Took a chance with the wide toe. These are too small and lack the 1/2 size. Pretty uncomfortable also. Look nice though.

Shoes are very comfortable. The front of my foot is very wide and lately I've been having trouble with all of my shoes being too narrow. It's become painful to walk. Put these on and no problem. Followed instructions and ordered a half size up because I need the insole. If they last 2 months it's more than worth the money!
The shoe itself is pretty comfortable, but if you're looking for a non slip work shoe, this definitely isn't it.
The shoe are as I thought they would be but, the black pair I thought I would get are dark blue.

I didn't think I would like zero drop soles as I expected to be no cushion between my foot and the ground. Well with these I do not notice any difference in comfort from normal sneakers. They allow the "barefoot" feel while protecting your feet. They are very well made and look great as well.

评论概述: Fits great, easy to slip on
评论详情: 13 wide fits perfectly. They have good traction and feel good. They feel durable yet feel light on my foot. I liked the first pair so much I got a second pair.

Pros:  Fits as expected as far as length.  So far they are comfortable to wear.  Overall quality seems to be ok.  Cons:  They squeak a lot when walking around in them. Not the shoe itself but rather most floors that aren’t carpeted. Even on dry floors. To the point that my son is kind of adverse to wearing them and I don’t want him wearing them. When he’s walking it’s probably every couple of steps there’s a horrible squeaking. He’s never had a pair of shoes that’s sounded like this when he’s walking.

Unfortunately, I injured my foot while wearing these shoes, and I've had to switch to more supportive rigid running shoes. The soft soles are not suitable for sports or hiking. While they might be comfortable for casual activities like boating, they lack the support needed for more demanding activities.  Although the toe box is wide, I found the overall fit and support to be lacking. I wear a men's size 14, and these shoes didn't provide the necessary support for my feet.
He has wider feet and is always looking for comfort. He absolutely loves these! Had to size down.

I love these shoes for around the house, the store, really anywhere. I have wide feet and it's hard to find shoes like this that fit me, and these fit right out of the box! I thought they would not have enough padding but it's been plenty! I wear them on some long days with a lot of time on my feet and they feel great! Really zero complaints!!

评论概述: The shoes I never knew I needed

评论概述: Men's Barefoot Wide Toe Box Shoes
评论详情: Description:  Title: Men's Barefoot Wide Toe Box Shoes Style: Minimalist Barefoot Shoes Sole: Zero Drop Sole Fit: Extra Wide Closure: Slip-On Features:  Minimalist Design: Designed to provide a natural feel with minimal cushioning and support, encouraging a barefoot-like experience. Wide Toe Box: Extra-wide design allows for natural toe splay and increased comfort, reducing the risk of bunions and other foot issues. Zero Drop Sole: The sole is flat from heel to toe, promoting a more natural posture and gait. Slip-On: Easy to wear with a convenient slip-on design, eliminating the need for laces or fasteners. Benefits:  Comfort: The wide toe box and minimalist design offer comfort and freedom of movement, allowing your feet to move naturally. Improved Foot Health: The zero drop sole helps in maintaining proper alignment and reducing impact on your joints. Versatility: Suitable for various activities including walking, casual outings, and light exercise. Breathable: Often made with materials that enhance breathability, keeping your feet cool and dry. Usage:  Daily Wear: Ideal for everyday use, providing comfort and support for long hours of wear. Outdoor Activities: Can be used for light outdoor activities such as walking, hiking on easy trails, or casual sports. Indoor Use: Great for indoor environments where comfort and ease of movement are desired. Care Instructions:  Cleaning: Follow the manufacturer’s instructions for cleaning. Typically, hand wash or machine wash on a gentle cycle, and air dry. Storage: Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight to prevent material degradation. Gift Idea:  Ideal For: Individuals who value comfort and natural movement, such as minimalists, those with foot health concerns, or anyone seeking a versatile and comfortable footwear option.

Ever since Hey Dude shoes took off, I longed for a pair because they just looked so comfortable. Every store I went to, I was never in luck. I wear a size 14 (15 in some brands) and every Hey Dude in a 14 or 15 were just too small. I ran across these on Amazon a few weeks ago but hesitated to pull the trigger. Then one day, I said the heck with it and got a pair. They are extremely comfortable and light as expected. I have flat feet so I knew after a few hours, my feet would most likely be killing me so I added a paid or insoles I use in my running shoes. This made a world of difference. I'm tempted to order a couple more in different colors. Give them a try. I think you'll be pleased.
I bought these to lift and wear casually… Ended up getting roped into a run at the ballpark dressed as a hamburger. Absolutely rocked the competition. Big thanks to these bad boys.

评论概述: I've been using them EVERY DAY for work for two months
评论详情: I love them. Keep in mind that i use them 40hs a week, constantly standing, and i couldnt be happier with them. They're excellently built and super comfy. The only iffy thing is that it's a very hot day (as it usually happens here in Florida) you'll feel the heat of the asphalt on your feet if you walk with this shoes. Nothing terryble, but they're THAT thin. I love them

These shoes are ugly as sin. I feel like a total dork wearing them, so needless to say I don't wear them often. They are not "wide" in the traditional sense, but are meant for people with wide toes...I guess. Wide toes that all bend inward. The material feels like boat or diving shoes and they are not easily "slipped on" as suggested. I liked the color combination (blue/tan), but that's of no concern to the racoons when I wear them to take out the trash.
Love the extra width and they look great.  Not yet tried fully barefoot inside but with ankle socks they are work fine.

I would have given this 5 stars but for just a couple reasons. Great fit but I don's suggest wearing these without socks, you'll get swamp foot fairly quickly, these could be a bit more ventilated. Nice design not having to use the laces but I keep having to reset the rubber peices over the lace ends or they'll pop off.  I would suggest them, I use them for heavy lifting days at the gym so I can slip them off easy and put on lifting shoes, handy

评论概述: super comfy from the moment I put them on
评论详情: most shoes are okay at first but require a break in period for me, not these they were actually perfect right when I put them on. I wear a size 13 and most shoes feel tight around the sides of my feet at first. I wear these all the time now for a little break from having to wear boots when I'm out working.

These shoes are really very nice if you're the kind of person who hates wearing shoes.  They're thin, minimal material and very flexible, without the included insole they really let you feel the ground you're walking on, which can be good or bad depending on if you step on a big bit of gravel right in the middle of your heel or something, with the insole it's a lot less 'sensing' but also more forgiving.  My biggest complaint is probably the big ugly orange lace blockers to keep them slip-on. They look like they're supposed to be taken off and thrown away and I've actually had people comment on them like they were a price tag I left on or a security button or something.
My son has EE feet and needs to wear nice shoes for school. These are PERFECT. He says they're comfortable all day!

I am so happy with these shoes, especially for the price ($35 when writing this review)! These shoes fit me so comfortably. They are plenty wide with the wide front giving plenty of room for your toes. The sole does indeed keep moisture off my foot well. These slip right on and feel great walking in. I sit between size 13 and 14 usually for shoes, and the size 14 wide of these fits me just about perfectly. These look pretty good as well, with the stone white appearance and the orange lace stoppers for a splash of color contrast! From directly above they look a tad silly in my opinion with the wide toe area, but that's only really noticeable to me, so it's not a concern of mine. Overall, would highly recommend.

I've been getting into the whole barefoot thing for a little bit now, especially after having problems with my feet. These are by far the most comfortable shoes I have. They aren't zero drop but are a good in-between for someone just getting into barefoot shoes. The wide toe box gives me room to fully spread out my shoes but these have enough of a sole that you can't feel every little rock. A great transition and super comfortable shoes!

I can get away wearing these with certain pants or jeans but I can't pull them off with shorts because the wide box gives a clown shoe like vibe when they're not partially covered.  They're not uncomfortable and the insole gives options...but I think I'll stick to keeping my wide toe box shoes specific to training purposes.

These are like the best  of barefoot, feeling planted in the ground and having the full range of motion for stability, and the best part of shoes keeping your feet safe from gravel and broken glass and whatnot( especially the whatnot).

The size fit perfect my husband has a hard time finding shoes that are comfy for wide feet. He wears a size 14. It usly takes forever for him to find shoes that make him happy. I seen this and thought hey let's give them a try. He been wearing them everyday since I got them. He says they help his foot pain and there is support in them. They weight of them are light so they are easy to move around in. I would definitely be buying more in the feature!

These are now one of my favorite shoes. I travel a lot and these shoes are comfortable and easy to clip on and off. The extra space in the toes is amazing. I was a little unsure of what size to get since I normally wear a 9.5 but I got a 10 and they fit great. They are breathable, soft, and provide the protection I need with the feeling of being barefoot. Overall, I can't think of anything I don't like about these shoes.

I'm a little disappointed that these are marketed as "wide". They look very wide due to a narrow heel cup, but if you actually have wide feet, you may be disappointed. My feet aren't even that wide and I often wear "standard" sized shoes, but I can feel my toes against both sides of the toe box in these shoes. When I held them up to a pair of standard Skechers, the toe box is the same width. It's just the heel is narrower on these. The length is perfect, so I wouldn't want to go up a size. They just aren't as wide as they look.  The toe box is also kind of short, vertically. Without the insole, there is room. With the insole in the shoe it feels a bit crowded.  I love the versatility of these shoes. The included insoles do a good job of absorbing shock without being mushy or squishing down. Taking them out gives a pretty barefoot-like experience. The sole is flexible, but firm. It doesn't absorb much energy as you walk.  The style is nice. I've been complimented on how the navy color coordinates with blue jeans. I like that there is a sole color other than white! White soles look dirty instantly. These brown soles hide the dirt better.  Breathability seems fine. My feet are often hot but I don't think I've ever found a shoe that actually breathes enough for me. These are comparable to other "breathable" casual shoes.
I purchased specifically for the wide fit and wider toe box. There was a bit of extra room in the toes, but the overall size was way too narrow. Would not recommend if you have wide feet.

评论概述: Barefoot Bliss - Slip-On Comfort with Spacious Style
评论详情: This pair of gray Pulltop barefoot shoes arrived in a form-fitting shoebox.  A set of shoestrings were housed in a ziplock bag.  The shoes were wrapped in tissue paper.These shoes redefine walking comfort with their wide toe box and zero-drop sole, offering a natural fit that feels like a second skin.  Side note:  I love wide and square toe shoes.  That's all I've looked for for decades, since discovering their existence.The breathable cotton fabric keeps things cool, while the collapsible heel makes them as versatile as slippers.  Elastic laces make slipping them on a breeze, and the durable rubber soles ensure they can handle whatever terrain you throw at them.Barefoot?  No way.  I don't need a toxic zone here.  Well, allegedly no funky foot odors here - just pure, unadulterated comfort.  The shoes are nice for those who want the barefoot experience without sacrificing style!  The do look cool.  These kicks kick.All in all, I'm happy with these shoes.  Should my experience with them change in the future, the review will be updated.

These barefoot shoes are comfortable and practical. The wide toe box allows for natural movement, and the zero-drop sole is great for walking. They’re easy to slip on and perfect for casual wear. A solid choice for anyone looking for minimalist footwear.

These feel gross, that's the only way I can put it. They feel like I made some shoes out of scrap I had laying around the house. They're also pretty ugly in person, the pictures on here just don't fully encompass how goofy the large toe box looks.

I love me my barefoot shoes and this seems to be a close looker to a similar shoe. Overall the build quality is okay I would not say this is a tank of a shoe and its not meant to be. It is very light and the material does not flex much around the foot. I wish it had more of a stretch as to hold my foot better and give me more feed back. There is a cork insole which was an interesting touch though i am not 100% sure i like the insole of this shoe it does seem to add some comfort but gives an interesting feeling while wearing.  I have only logged about 20k steps in the shoe so far and it seems to be decently comfortable Ill probably need to double it to see if anything really changes. The shoe didnt really need break in but it did help the fabric mold a little to my foot shape as well as the cork but very little chnaged in terms of comfort.
